openrent.notes: Search for 1-bedroom properties in London under £1500/month

rightmove.notes: Example Rightmove search - adjust parameters as needed

instructions.openrent: Go to openrent.com, use filters, copy the resulting URL
instructions.rightmove: Go to rightmove.co.uk, use filters, copy the resulting URL
instructions.telegram_setup: Create bot with @BotFather, get token, add bot to groups/chats, get chat IDs from getUpdates API
